    • Method Detail

      • listProjectMembersEnterprise

        public ResponseList<ProjectMember> listProjectMembersEnterprise(java.lang.Long projectId,
                                                                java.lang.String search,
                                                                java.lang.String languageId,
                                                                java.lang.Long workflowStepId,
                                                                java.lang.Integer limit,
                                                                java.lang.Integer offset)
                                                         throws HttpException,
                                                                HttpBadRequestException
        List project members. For Crowdin Enterprise only
        Parameters:
        projectId - Project Identifier. Get via List Projects
        search - Search users by firstName, lastName or username
        languageId - Language Identifier. Get via Project Target Languages
        workflowStepId - Workflow Step Identifier. Get via List Workflow Steps
        limit - A maximum number of items to retrieve
        offset - A starting offset in the collection
        Returns:
        list of project members
        Throws:
        HttpException
        HttpBadRequestException
        See Also:
        • Enterprise API Documentation

      • listUsers

        public ResponseList<User> listUsers(Status status,
                                    java.lang.String search,
                                    TwoFactor twoFactor,
                                    java.lang.Integer limit,
                                    java.lang.Integer offset)
                             throws HttpException,
                                    HttpBadRequestException
        Parameters:
        status - filter by status
        search - search users by firstName, lastName, username, or email (2 or more characters)
        twoFactor - filter by two-factor authentication status
        limit - maximum number of items to retrieve (default 25)
        offset - starting offset in the collection (default 0)
        Returns:
        list of users
        Throws:
        HttpException
        HttpBadRequestException
        See Also:
        • Enterprise API Documentation

                                                   java.lang.String search,
                                                   java.lang.Integer limit,

                                            throws HttpException,
                                                   HttpBadRequestException
        Parameters:
